column5: We are looking for a late fall trip to nw ontario for walleye, pike , and anything else that will bite we go up every year for the opener to lac seul and would like to try someplace new for the fall but I know the fishing is alot differnt in the fall, so our spring spot wont be very good. Looking for a remote drive in or boat in / taking my own boat Dont want to pay for their retirement with a weeks worth of fishing( haha) also theres only going to be two or three of us any help would be great thank you
www.osullivansrainbow.com Pike, walleye, lake trout, reasonable rates, housekeeping or camping. Bill Krejca
www.vermilionbaylodge.com Very nice place family run camp
http://www.witchbay.com/Family run place. Great camp. Most of their business is return customers.They are on Lake of the Woods.

call stan at north star lodge on clay lake..been there late in the year a few times.wallies and smallies and pike..never very far from fish.like at the end of the dock! great boats,food and accomodations.only resort on the lake.30 mins from vermilion bay..good luck with your search,but you cant go wrong here.wish i was going too.www.northstarlodge.com..jig
email me at [email protected]. I can help you with a great place that won't break the bank.
